Article.ArticleTitle: From Continuous Coverage to Medicaid Expansion: North Carolina's Changing Public Payer Landscape.

Abstract.AbstractText: During the COVID-19 pandemic, people who may have otherwise lost Medicaid coverage kept it without the need to reapply annually. In 2023, this continuous coverage began to unwind just as North Carolina prepared to expand Medicaid. This issue of the North Carolina Medical Journal tracks the evolution of the state's public payer landscape in unprecedented times of change, with data, analysis, and personal experiences from public health, philanthropy, clinicians, and Medicaid members.
